main.name: Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror

notes.text: I finally hit KoG for the first time with this. I was close many times with GB a couple months ago, and the month before that, but I just didn't have the emotional capacity to slog through it. I didn't even try last month. I used a fiends farewell version from gold up to legend 1, then I switched to duel standby. I'm so grateful for this meta change up!
